website_summaries.verdict: A fun and colorful taco holder set that is also microwave safe, although some owners feel the quality here leaves a bit to be desired.
pros: Dishwasher safe, and they stack for easy storage
holds a variety of hard and soft taco shell sizes
cons: Some say these are on the thin and flimsy side
May warp when exposed to heat

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I read the product information and the reviews on the various options before I decided on this taco holder. So pleased with this product. I set up a taco bar for friends last night, and they could not have worked better. Also, they did fine in the dishwasher, and they’re easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: GARW

customer_reviews.title: and the tacos are easy to put in and take out
customer_reviews.text: Simple, but effective! These allow you to choose how many you put on your plate, as opposed to taco plates with 2 or 3 slots. Plus, you are not locked into having those "wells" that are for beans and rice. They don't slide around on the plate, and the tacos are easy to put in and take out. So glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Fay Burton

customer_reviews.title: Tired of Tipping Tacos
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these for a "kitchen gadget" gift exchange. I see why they get such high praise. I loved them so much I came back for a second set for my kitchen They stack together and fit right into a kitchen drawer. They hold our tacos (even soft shell flour tortillas) perfectly. I didn't even know I needed taco holders, but now they are a Taco Tuesday requirement.
customer_reviews.author: DanaJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily use
customer_reviews.text: My only complain about these is the width angle, you really cant "load them up" as much as you could with a V shaped holder. I do like that they are independent and space them on a normal plate to accommodate other items. They are good fro daily use as well as use with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Farst

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I expected but they were perfect for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: minseven

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect taco holders. They don't take up a bunch of space on your plate so you can add other sides. Colorful and sturdy and easy to wash. They were a big hit last night super glad I bought them. great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rebe E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for soft corn tortilla tacos
customer_reviews.text: These are fun and festive and work perfectly for 6" soft corn tortilla tacos to keep them standing nicely on your plate instead of flopping everywhere. 12 pack is great for families or parties. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but work great. Just what I needed to help my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but work great. Just what I needed to help my kids be able to make their own tacos!
customer_reviews.author: Aylene W. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Don’t pay more for something fancy when these cheapies work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job in a fun way
customer_reviews.text: These taco holders did the job. I had set up a buffet line, and let everyone build their own tacos. They only had one hand since they were holding their plate, so these taco shell holders came in really handy to hold the taco upright. They are just little plastic things, but did the job, were a good price, and are easy to store away for next time. Plus my guests thought they were fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mom First

customer_reviews.title: Practical and inexspenotsive
customer_reviews.text: So simple in design but solves a dilemma The taco doesn't fall while stuffing and it's a great holder in between bites
customer_reviews.author: Mike Winters

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for soft tacos
customer_reviews.text: Simply, the soft tacos became stuck in the groove of your taco holder. So when I went to take it out of the holder (to eat it) it ended up ripping apart the main body of the taco. So that is why I gave this taco holder a two star. Now, if and when I eat a hard shell taco (that is why I am not requesting a return) ...maybe it will move up a notch or two? But as of now, in my life, my tacos have been of the soft shell variety.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H. Glickman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a simple and useful tool for serving/eating tacos! Also, a very bright and festive addition to our table setting!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Smart
customer_reviews.text: Someone was very smart, this is so much better then having everything falling over
customer_reviews.author: Gaila T.

customer_reviews.title: A great invention
customer_reviews.text: These work great for the smaller hard taco shells. I've even used them on soft shell tacos with some special loading of the shells. Where have these been all my life? Probably not good on the large flat bottom self standing hard shell tacos.
customer_reviews.author: Oldfartsoftballplayer

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: These are so helpful. We already had 4 but needed more ago I got 24 more. I love these things
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these for taco night!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. They get excited sbout taco night and want to assemble everyone's taco. They work great and were a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Madsen

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: nice to fill tacos with the tortilla standing up instead of messing with it on its side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. As previously stated they are cheap and you should hand wash/rinse when finished and let dry.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Individual Taco Holders work Great !!
customer_reviews.text: Product works better than imagined, and shipping and customer service from supplier couldn't have been better !! Highly Recommended !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Higgins Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal taco holders.
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best taco holders I have found. Very sturdy and easy to use. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Schtumpy51

customer_reviews.title: Works great for taco night
customer_reviews.text: These are as expected. Works great for taco night. They nest and store in a very small space. The colors are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and easy to use. Worked well with hard shells. Have not tried soft shells yet. Only three would fit on a standard plate but that's OK. Everyone picked a color and stayed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whole family enjoys them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! They do exactly what they are supposed to do... Stand! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: K Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Tuesday Taco Night!
customer_reviews.text: Have always thought about buying taco holders, glad I bought yours! They are very sturdy which surprised me because they look flimsy-absolutely not! Loved using them and easy to clean.....
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: best one yet
customer_reviews.text: no more tacos falling over on the plate and the stuffing falling out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heath

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I can now stand my tacos up in the microwave!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Good for setting up tacos
customer_reviews.text: These are helpful to use while filling your tacos. They are a bit too light weight for using through out the eating of the tacos. Good price for large set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love them but they are pretty low quality and will probably break eventually . On the underside there is a ridge Which catches water in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Northwoods Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: It does not hold tacos properly. I tried hard shells, soft shells, big and small.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Pam

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure if they would actually hold them up, but they did. Colors are bright just like picture, adds color to the table. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: nant

customer_reviews.title: They're easier to lose.
customer_reviews.text: The holders were used for hard shell tacos. They worked very well and kept the tacos upright so that there was no spillage. Much cheaper and lighter than the heavier metal ones. They work better than the metal (holders used in restaurants) for smaller kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every taco family needs!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Easy to use, keeps tacos upright and my husband and kids love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Peck

customer_reviews.title: love tacos
customer_reviews.text: these things are great no more falling over and spilling out of taco we love them thanks doug
customer_reviews.author: doug f

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to use, nice and smal for storing, and they get the job done! Not very sturdy but it isn’t too big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Collier

customer_reviews.title: Works on taco Tuesday
customer_reviews.text: First world problem I know, but allows my family to easily make up all their tacos for dinner!
customer_reviews.author: ASFAscience

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great and my kids like to choose their own color. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Zortman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like the single taco holder, more room on the plate for side dishes. T
customer_reviews.author: Debra W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: They work fine. A little flimsy but no problem. One of them melted in the dishwasher, I think it got jammed in an unfortunate spot but I hand wash them now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Simple little thing you knew you needed just never got. We'll get hem they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: These are super easy and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: My family loved these. Now our tacos don't dump out all over the plate!! Yay!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Mobray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: thay do what the product is made for what more can you ask

customer_reviews.title: no more messes
customer_reviews.text: no more taco land slides ,work great .IO love them so far

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must for taco dinner
customer_reviews.text: I have a pub and we service taco plates on Tuesdays. These holders are a hit with my customers and their plates stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they work well, but i do feel i overpaid for them. $12 is about twice what these should cost.
customer_reviews.author: Rich-Boston

customer_reviews.title: Microwaveable and Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: These Taco holders work great and for a very good price. Really like the fact they are Microwavable and Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A

customer_reviews.title: Fun for tacos
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Handy when loading tacos. Kids think it’s fun.

customer_reviews.title: microwave safe
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find taco holders that could go in the microwave, but these can.
customer_reviews.author: Nell Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and easy to clean and store
customer_reviews.text: They keep your tacos upright making it easier to fill. Very handy and easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the Taco holders and they work great, very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Taco holders and they work great, very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and clean and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Hole is deceptively narrow
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and flimsy. Was hoping these would be double-use items for tacos AND something like hot dogs but it's barely a wide enough hole for the squared taco shells. Disappointed but didn't return.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear15

customer_reviews.title: Grab the smallest tortillas you can find and you will be fine
customer_reviews.text: These a great idea and very affordable, but you have to use the smallest tortillas you can find. Even a standard size (Mission brand) corn tortilla is too big and flops over. You can't fill it.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're taco holders. They hold the tacos. There's not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: One was broken. Not a big complaint for such a low price. I'll still use the rest since this purchase was to replace a few that were broken from use.
customer_reviews.author: mjjunie

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice but a couple arrived broken so I don’t get ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice but a couple arrived broken so I don’t get a whole dozen which is what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Work great for serving tacos
customer_reviews.text: Work great for serving tacos. Kids were very excited until they realized after 1 or 2 bites it doesn't hold the Taco anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ames Fitby

customer_reviews.title: Confused as I am about my product?
customer_reviews.text: Small when I try to put the shell in the holder it falls over still. I try to stuff my taco it won't stay up right. When guest like theirs spicey or nonspicey i forget who's are who's cause I can't tell which is clear and which is clear. When i place my cute colorfully clear taco holders on my trey to serve my tacos fall over and everything spills out again all over my trey.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Stark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let the plastic and very thin deter you, it holds the shells and are microwave and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: Life is Good

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Holds the tacos up.....so five stars for doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: Ecatch

customer_reviews.title: Holders work great
customer_reviews.text: These really work great since I deep fry my flour shells and they tend to fall apart when eating them. The holders work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Take less space on your plate
customer_reviews.text: I wanted taco holders to make filling the shells easier and have the tacos stand upright on the plate so they don't slip into other foods making them messy and soggy, but I wanted to be able to have a single taco on the plate without the holder taking up so much space as the metal holders. When I saw these, I thought they looked perfect and they are. I also like that you can stagger the tacos on your plate which also creates a little more space. You can use them for soft tacos as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jana K

customer_reviews.title: Truly makes tacos easier without costing as much as "taco racks"
customer_reviews.text: We've had a couple of packs of these for a while. When we were having a big party with 40 people and we put together a taco bar, we picked up some more so everyone could use them and they were a huge hit. I can't imagine making home tacos (hard or soft) without them anymore. And they next together and store so well.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as kind of a joke, and ended up LOVING them. They actually hold soft tacos just as well as hard, and keeps them from tipping over and everything falling out. They also make it super easy to assemble them, so you’re not trying to shove lettuce in a flopped-over taco!
customer_reviews.author: lytesnhats

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who likes tacos need this!
customer_reviews.text: Hard shell taco not broken. What a treat!. Holds them just right
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: They're okay.
customer_reviews.text: They're made of a pretty flimsy grade of plastic but they work well. I expect them to break as soon as something gets dropped on them in my storage drawer.
customer_reviews.author: OkieReader

customer_reviews.title: No More Fighting with Corn Tacos!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, small plastic holder for hard shell tacos, keeps them upright for filling. Three holders will fit on a regular size dinner plate. Taco nights are less messy now. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: MONA B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Taco Holder
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars because arrived on time and in perfect condition. Also - Holder holds both standard and Nacho, flat bottom tacos. Since it holds a single taco and that there are 12 of them, you can use them in any number desired. Can also transfer to plate after filling and use as a stand during the eating process. Inexpensive and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: They work on different sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Although they are very lightweight plastic, they are very stable. They hold the shell up while stuffing and when full. I put them in top rack of dishwasher and they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: tsherryb

customer_reviews.title: These taco holders are great
customer_reviews.text: Love these- works great for tacos, clean up easy and takes almost no space to store.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Simple tool that does it job well.
customer_reviews.text: What more can you say, it holds up the tacos well so they don't fall over. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Taco Tuesday just got better!!
customer_reviews.text: We got these to add into a fundraiser gift basket and bought another set for our own. Great for kids. Doesn't take up much space to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A silly must have.
customer_reviews.text: They work! Hard or soft shells fit nicely and are easy to fill. I use them a few time a week. Perfect size and to store.
customer_reviews.author: Cal City Nick

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: These are great,there durable,easy to clean and use and don't take u alot of room! Every night can be taco night!

customer_reviews.text: Used them last night and my family just loved them. Thanks great idea.

customer_reviews.title: Product works great and holds tacos wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Product works great and holds tacos wonderfully!! A couple of them were cracked when arrived. But other than that they are great.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After years of use these holders are still making life easier.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item to use with tacos and to help prepare your taco.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look good, but after one use the ones that I have used are already warped from heat.

customer_reviews.title: Love these holders!
customer_reviews.text: Host had these at Mexican themed dinner, I loved them, and ordered the next day.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These are practical and adorable! They work well and make a really fun presentation.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these for taco nights! Great for soft shell or hard shell!

customer_reviews.title: Muy Bueno!
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done. There are some sharp edges on the under side of them so if you buy these, be careful washing them. They survived the top rack of the dishwasher. The large taco shells and the stand and stuff shells could not be used with these.. These are made for the small/original size shells.

customer_reviews.title: Make taco eating with kids less messy
customer_reviews.text: Do what they are intended to do. a bit thin so a couple have broken with normal use. Make taco eating with kids less messy

customer_reviews.title: Taco holders.
customer_reviews.text: Not so good. Small and the Tortillas bend over without enough support. Used them once and tossed them away.

customer_reviews.title: Great for taco Tuesday
customer_reviews.text: Like the multi colors and they are thin and easy to clean and don’t take up much room on the plate.

product_meta.title: Set of 12 Original Homey Product Taco Holders - Colorful Non Toxic BPA Free Microwave Safe Stands for Soft and Hard Shells
product_meta.description:
Feel like tacos? Let us help! 
12 fun, easy, convenient, safe and perfectly designed individual taco stands 
Prevent your taco shells from breaking, slipping or flopping. 
Prepare them, store them, heat them, all in the same holders. 
No need to use plates, trays, racks, etc. Homey Taco Holders are all you need.
feature_bullets: WE MAKE IT EASY - Use Homey Taco Holders for soft taco shells and hard taco shells of just about any shape - rounded, sharp, square, Dali, whatever the style you like - as these holders are open at the bottom, yet the perfect size and depth for a solid hold, as you construct, arrange, and load them up.

WE MAKE IT CONVENIENT - Throw those beautifully loaded tacos in the microwave, right on these holders - they are microwave safe. They are also heat resistant so no worries about working with hot ingredients (just be safe!) and when you're done, throw them right in the dishwasher - they can take it!

WE MAKE IT HEALTHY - This should probably be at the top of the list. An important quality of Homey Taco Holders is that they are made from non toxic BPA-free Polypropylene. You can safely use them long term and even freeze your tacos in them, if you'd like. No toxic paints are used for the colors.

WE KEEP IT SIMPLE - Homey Taco Holers are fun, colorful, light, and simple. Stack the twelve holders together for easy storage, without taking up space or adding any weight to your trip or picnic basket. They look good on a plate or in the middle of a table, perfect for the outdoors and look great at a party.

WE GUARANTEE - We are so confident in our products that we offer you our 100% money back satisfaction guarantee. With us, you get quality and complete support. Have comments, questions, complaints? Let us know and we are on it. Would like to return the taco holders for a full refund? Absolutely!
